articles.author: Priscilla Alvarez
articles.title: Trump team maps out Latin America strategy as part of mass deportation plan - CNN
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump’s team is gaming out an aggressive strategy toward Latin America that will be a crucial element to plans to deport migrants at large scale, according to two sources involved in transition policy discussions.
